title: How to remain AI-proof in a rapidly changing world
description: Building an AI-proof career has quickly become a priority, and experts across industries are repeatedly outlining what professionals must do to remain relevant. From technology leaders to educators and business executives, the message is clear: the rise of artificial intelligence will reshape work, but those who listen, adapt and prepare will not be left behind.

title: AI Sore Big Tech Cos' Artificial Splurge Eats Into Stock Buybacks
description: In a bold pivot towards the future, major tech giants are pulling back on stock buybacks to invest heavily in artificial intelligence. Their focus on developing advanced AI capabilities, rather than returning cash to shareholders, indicates a strategic shift that could reshape the industry landscape.
